app.subtitle: Learn How Machines Learn
app.sendsuccess: Your model was successfully sent to your robot

connection.unsuccessful: Connection refused. Please re-check your robot's IP and try again.
connection.successful: Connection successful. You are connected to the robot.

data.selectionprompt: Select data on the left to display them
data.selectionpromptheatmap: Select data on the left to display heatmap. If you've already selected data then the heatmap isn't available for this dataset

datavisualization.error: Your chosen data could not be plotted. Please try to match features and labels again and be sure to select a problem class

preprocessing.explanationdnd: All data that isn't dragged to either the features or the labels column will be dropped
preprocessing.name: Name for the preprocessed data
preprocessing.percentage: Ratio of trainings and test data
preprocessing.checkbox: Shuffle data when splitting into training and test set
